from math import *

n, m = map(int,input().split())
dp = list(map(int,input().split()))

dp.sort()
mod = 10 ** 9 + 7
k = factorial(n-m)
k //= factorial(dp[0]-1)

for i in range(1, m):
    k //= factorial(dp[i]-dp[i-1]-1)
    
    if dp[i]-dp[i-1]-1 != 0:
        k *= 2**(dp[i]-dp[i-1]-2)
        
k //= factorial(n-dp[-1])

print(k % mod)
